description:
Controls various aspects of page processing, such as the output of HTML code in pages. One
  benefit of this option is managing whitespace that can occur in output pages served by CFML.
name: setting

requesttimeout.description:
number of seconds. Time limit, after which CFML processes the page as an unresponsive thread.
			Overrides the timeout set in the Railo Administrator.

showdebugoutput.description:
Yes or No. When set to No, showDebugOutput suppresses debugging information that would
		otherwise display at the end of the generated page.Default is Yes.

enablecfoutputonly.description: Yes or No. When set to Yes, cfsetting blocks output of HTML that resides outside cfoutput tags.
